data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The pyramid has limitations, of course (Where do The Treachery Of Images and Fountain fall? Does ____ horizontal ____ along ____ verbal ____ dictate ____ the ____ are ____ on ____ page ____ how ____ describe ____? ) but it is a cool little invention.
data.partBlankContent: The pyramid has limitations, of course (Where do The Treachery Of Images and Fountain fall? Does t__ horizontal ax__ along t__ verbal ed__ dictate h__ the wo___ are disp_____ on t__ page o_ how th__ describe thi___? ) but it is a cool little invention.
data.answer: 当然，金字塔也有局限性(《图像的背叛》和《喷泉》在哪里?沿文字边缘的水平轴是否指示了文字如何在页面上显示或它们如何描述事物?)但这是一个很酷的小发明。
